column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered the deep dish pizza and fried calamari to share between my husband and I. The pizza honestly wasn't that great. It was quite dry and hard to chew
column2: but the calamari was superb. I was quite disappointed at their deep dish pizza
column3: would not order that again in the future. Maybe I will come back and try their other dishes next time.
